title: Many Of Oregon's Coastal Schools, Hospitals And Fire Stations At Tsunami Risk
teaser: The buildings are in the tsunami zone, meaning they'd likely be washed away in the event of a massive earthquake and tsunami. Seismologists say there's a 37 percent chance of a major quake along the West Coast in the next fifty years â€” the kind of quake that hit Japan in 2011.
